lines.text: Sir, I realize this is your jurisdiction. But if there is a rescue attempt, we would like to volunteer.

Commissioner Murdock, I couldn't agree more. I think it is vital that the rescues know Commandant Lassard intimately. Now, I can vouch for the abilities of these officers. After all, I trained them myself.
[Captain Harris, with the word Dork burned into his chest, approaches a bar where Cmndt. Lassard, Chief Hurst, Chief Murdock, and the Mayor of Miami are seated]
Oh Mr. Mayor, excuse me sir. I don't mean to insult your city, but the people on this beach are very rude and hostile.
Well, I'm sorry to hear that... Captain Dork!
[the gentlemen at the bar break down in laughter, and Harris finally realizes what has been burned on to his chest]
Some dickhead is standing in my sun!
Oh, Captain Harris! Hey, I didn't see you there. You know, I don't think we've been introduced. My name is Nick...
I don't care who you are, buttwipe. Just get out of my sun!
Buttwipe, huh? Never heard that before.
You'll never get away with this, you two-bit filthy scum!
Ah. Well, perhaps you'd like to leave now.

[a shark starts swimming toward the beach and everybody is running away until the shark swims right up to Tackleberry's gun]
. You leave the swimming area NOW, Mister!
